duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate scheduling to ensure service delivery in a single-family home and assist with continuous quality improvements in service management.
Assure the management and delivery of all contracted services.
Provide supervision and training of Direct Support Professionals.
Assist those living in the home to complete personal and medical cares.
Collect data and completes documentation of service delivery.
Function as the main point of contact for Direct Support Professionals working in the home and the individuals living in the home.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Social Work, Psychology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
